name: fileIsEOF
description: Determines whether ColdFusion has reached the end of the file while reading it.

examples.title: Simple usage syntax
examples.description: Call fileIsEOF on a file object and save the result to a variable.

examples.title: Using fileIsEOF to loop over all lines of a text file
examples.description: Simplified example of using fileIsEOF to determine when all lines have been read from a file. Error handling omitted for clarity.
